text: Saint Petersburg Metro is the rapid transit system in the city of Saint Petersburg and Leningrad Oblast (Province) in Russia. It opened on 15 November 1955. This metro is a combination of strong transport system and beautiful stations with expensive decorations. It is a good addition to the historic image of the city. There are 5 metro lines and 73 stations. 2-3 million people use it every day. == Lines == Colour and icon Name Year when it opened Long Stations on it Line 1 1955 29,6 km 19 Line 2 1961 30,1 km 18 Line 3 1967 22,6 km 12 Line 4 1985 14,8 km 9 Line 5 2008 20 km 15 All: 113,5 km 67 Category:Saint Petersburg Category:Rapid transit systems
title: Saint Petersburg Metro
